info.author: Mark Nottingham
classifiers: Topic :: Software Development :: Libraries :: Python Modules
info.description:
Sparta is an Python API for RDF that is designed to help easily learn and navigate the Semantic Web 
programmatically. Unlike other RDF interfaces, which are generally triple-based, Sparta binds RDF nodes 
to Python objects and RDF arcs to attributes of those Python objects.
info.name: sparta
info.html_description: Sparta is an Python API for RDF that is designed to help easily learn and navigate the Semantic Web programmatically. Unlike other RDF interfaces, which are generally triple-based, Sparta binds RDF nodes to Python objects and RDF arcs to attributes of those Python objects.
